int16.info: when multiple listeners are in different sound environments in split screen, the combined environment will be the one with the highest priority
int16.name: priority

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; intensity of the room effect
float32.name: room_intensity

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; intensity of the room effect above the High Frequency Reference
float32.name: room_intensity_high_frequency

float32.info: 0 - 10 only; how quickly the room effect rolls off
float32.name: room_rolloff

float32.info: Herz; 20 - 20,000 only; for high frequency values, what value defines high frequency
float32.name: high_frequency_reference
